00042 function PrintDateTimeForm($remotetime)
00043 {
00044     global $TimeServer;
00045 
00046     if ($_SESSION['TimeServer']) {
00047         $TimeServer= $_SESSION['TimeServer'];
00048     }
00049 
00050     $day= date('d');
00051     $month= date('m');
00052     $year= date('y');
00053     $hour= date('H');
00054     $min= date('i');
00055     
00056     $confirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to set the date?');
00057     ?>
00058     <tr class="oddline">
00059         <td class="title">
00060             <?php echo _TITLE('Time server').':' ?>
00061         </td>
00062         <td>
00063             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00064                 <input type="text" name="TimeServer" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="50" value="<?php echo $TimeServer ?>" />
00065                 <input type="submit" name="Display" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Display') ?>"/>
00066                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $confirm ?>')"/>
00067                 <?php
00068                 if (isset($remotetime)) {
00069                     echo '<br />'.$remotetime;
00070                 }
00071                 ?>
00072             </form>
00073         </td>
00074         <td class="none">
00075             <?php
00076             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('Usually the network time daemon adjusts the system clock according to Internet time servers gradually. But if the clock is too out of sync with the time servers, you are advised to set the system clock to Internet time manually. You can use your own time server if you like.'));
00077             ?>
00078         </td>
00079     </tr>
00080     <tr class="evenline">
00081         <td class="title">
00082             <?php echo _TITLE('Date').':' ?>
00083         </td>
00084         <td>
00085             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00086                 <input type="text" name="Day" style="width: 20px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $day ?>" />.
00087                 <input type="text" name="Month" style="width: 20px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $month ?>" />.
00088                 <input type="text" name="Year" style="width: 20px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $year ?>" /> -
00089                 <input type="text" name="Hour" style="width: 20px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $hour ?>" />:
00090                 <input type="text" name="Minute" style="width: 20px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $min ?>" />
00091                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $confirm ?>')"/>
00092             </form>
00093         </td>
00094         <td class="none">
00095             <?php
00096             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('You can set the system clock here. Format is day.month.year-hour:minute.
00097 
00098 <b>You must be very careful when setting the system clock, significant hops in system time may cause system malfunction.</b>'));
00099             ?>
00100         </td>
00101     </tr>
00102     <?php
00103 }
00104 
00105 if ($_POST) {
00106     if ($_POST['Year'] && $_POST['Month'] && $_POST['Day'] && $_POST['Hour'] && $_POST['Minute']) {
00107         $NewDateTime= $_POST['Year'].$_POST['Month'].$_POST['Day'].$_POST['Hour'].$_POST['Minute'];
00108         if (!$View->Controller($Output, 'SetDateTime', $NewDateTime)) {
00109             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Time set failed: $NewDateTime");
00110         }
00111     }
00112     else if ($_POST['TimeServer']) {
00113         $_SESSION['TimeServer']= $_POST['TimeServer'];
00114         $TimeServer= $_SESSION['TimeServer'];
00115 
00116         if ($_POST['Apply']) {
00117             $View->Controller($Output, 'SetRemoteTime', $TimeServer);
00118         }
00119         else if ($_POST['Display']) {
00120             $View->Controller($Output, 'DisplayRemoteTime', $TimeServer);
00121         }
00122         $View->Controller($Output, 'GetRemoteTime');
00123         $RemoteTime= implode("\n", $Output);
00124     }
00125     else if ($_POST['MyName']) {
00126         $View->Controller($Output, 'SetMyName', trim($_POST['MyName']));
00127     }
00128     else if ($_POST['RootEmail']) {
00129         if ($View->Controller($Output, 'SetRootEmail', $_POST['RootEmail'])) {
00130             $View->Controller($Output, 'UpdateMailAliases');
00131         }
00132     }
00133 }
00134 
00135 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00136 ?>
00137 <table id="nvp">
00138     <tr class="oddline">
00139         <td class="title">
00140             <?php echo _TITLE('Hostname').':' ?>
00141         </td>
00142         <td>
00143             <?php
00144             if ($View->Controller($Myname, 'GetMyName')) {
00145                 ?>
00146                 <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00147                     <input type="text" name="MyName" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="50" value="<?php echo $Myname[0] ?>" />
00148                     <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00149                 </form>
00150                 <?php
00151             }
00152             ?>
00153         </td>
00154         <td class="none">
00155             <?php
00156             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('This is the system name. If you change the hostname, use automatic configuration button to apply it system-wide, and reboot the system.'));
00157             ?>
00158         </td>
00159     </tr>
00160     <tr class="evenline">
00161         <td class="title">
00162             <?php echo _TITLE('Admin e-mail').':' ?>
00163         </td>
00164         <td>
00165             <?php
00166             if ($View->Controller($RootEmail, 'GetRootEmail')) {
00167                 ?>
00168                 <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00169                     <input type="text" name="RootEmail" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="50" value="<?php echo $RootEmail[0] ?>" />
00170                     <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00171                 </form>
00172                 <?php
00173             }
00174             ?>
00175         </td>
00176         <td class="none">
00177             <?php
00178             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('ComixWall sends warning and information messages to its system administrator. Here you can type in your own e-mail address.'));
00179             ?>
00180         </td>
00181     </tr>
00182     <?php
00183     PrintDateTimeForm($RemoteTime);
00184     ?>
00185 </table>
00186 <?php
00187 PrintHelpWindow(_HELPWINDOW('New system hostname does not fully take effect until after reboot.
00188 
00189 Messages to the system administrator are directly transfered to the mail server hosting the e-mail address you have provided above. The remote mail server may consider e-mails sent from this system as spam, and move them into your spam or junk folder.'));
00190 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
